faq.question: What do you do?
faq.answer: Poultry specializes in building websites, mobile applications, and AI-powered solutions.

faq.question: How can you help my business?
faq.answer: We can design and develop custom digital products to enhance your online presence and automate your workflow using AI.

faq.question: Do you offer full-stack development?
faq.answer: Yes, our team handles both frontend and backend development for web and mobile platforms.

faq.question: What industries do you work with?
faq.answer: We work with a variety of industries including e-commerce, healthcare, finance, education, and more.

faq.question: Can you integrate AI into my app?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We can integrate features like chatbots, recommendation systems, and predictive analytics into your application.

faq.question: Where are you based?
faq.answer: Poultry operates remotely with a global team of developers and designers.
